short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract all the users with email following your LinkedIn profile, and all the users who your followed, Save user profile data to CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract all the users following your LinkedIn profile.
Find who amongst your LinkedIn followers are influencers with this powerful LinkedIn automation.
This LinkedIn automation can let you know your followers' follower count. This information is super powerful in order to determine who are your most influential followers.

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.

EXPORT COLUMNS
